question: ‘ASK DISHA’ is an online chat-bot of which Indian organisation?
option1: IRCTC -Indian Railways Catering and Tourism Corporation
option2: NPCI- National Payments Corporation of India
option4: SEBI- Securities Exchange Board of India
answer: IRCTC -Indian Railways Catering and Tourism Corporation
explanation:
IRCTC introduced the Artificial Intelligence-based on-line chatbot \'ASKDISHA\' in 2018, which assists the users of the site in ticket booking and tourism.
It was recently seen in news, as IRCTC has upgraded the chat-bot to converse in Hindi language, so that it can resolve the queries of passengers in Hindi. In an average, 3000 queries are being handled by ASK DISHA in Hindi per day.
